body_html:
To summarize, it looks like parameter server on Cray starts configured to use 1 core, which is not enough to keep up with 64 workers. As a result, the memory usage of ps grows without bound, possibly due to grpc backlog. The growth without bound might be something that can only be fixed on grpc side -- https://github.com/grpc/grpc

As far as TensorFlow thinking Cray computers only have one core, that could be filed as a separate issue.

@mbz Is there anything else to do on this issue before it's closed?
